lead_paragraph: The group examining the causes of the financial crisis hopes to produce a report by Dec. 15 that will influence future policies, but squabbles and turnover are hampering its efforts.
snippet: The group examining the causes of the financial crisis hopes to produce a report by Dec. 15 that will influence future policies, but squabbles and turnover are hampering its efforts.

headline.main: Staff Losses and Dissent May Hurt Crisis Panel
headline.seo: Staff Losses and Dissent May Hurt Crisis Panel
headline.print_headline: Internal Dissent and Staff Losses May Hurt Financial Crisis Panel

byline.original: By SEWELL CHAN and ERIC DASH
byline.contributor: Sewell Chan reported from Washington, and Eric Dash from New York. Barclay Walsh contributed research.
